<div align="center">
    <h2>Coffee Guide</h2>
</div>

![meganxli github io_coffee-guide_ (1)](https://github.com/MeganxLi/coffee-guide/assets/87239200/61e4dccf-ccfe-4f41-aba9-e69e83cb01cf)

<p align="center">
 整合澳洲在地咖啡館之咖啡品項資訊，以解決來自不同國籍旅客在點餐時因不熟悉咖啡成分而產生的困惑與猶豫。透過本網頁，使用者將能更便利地篩選與選定符合其偏好的咖啡。
</p>
<p align="center">
  <a href="https://meganxli.github.io/coffee-guide/">
    <img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/Demo_website-Your?&style=for-the-badge&logo=data:image/svg%2bxml;base64,&logoColor=ffffff&color=282828" />
  </a>
</p>

## Description

### Programming Languages

- JavaScript
- TypeScript
- Vite

### Frontend

- [React.js](https://reactjs.org/)
- [Vite](https://vitejs.dev/)
- [EsLint](https://eslint.org/)
- [Linaria](https://linaria.dev/)
- [i18next](https://www.i18next.com/)

## Building

### Install Packages

```
$ npm install
```

### Start Dev Server

```
$ npm run dev
```
